gulf.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a large area of sea partly enclosed by land
gulf.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a great difference and lack of understanding between two groups of people, especially in their beliefs, opinions, and way of life
gulf.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: the huge gulf between management and unions
a growing gulf between old and young
gulf.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a brand of oil and petrol
gulf.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: a great difference or lack of understanding between two groups of people
gulf.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: The South African Government must intervene to reduce the gulf between white wealth and black poverty.
gulf.translation[2].definitions[1].defin: a big difference between two amounts, levels etc
gulf.translation[2].definitions[1].examp: The result is a 30% gulf between actual company hirings this year and projected hiring next year.
